attributes.title: this app is awful
attributes.review: completely terrible, absolutely disgusting, does not work, totally unusable, unsafe, irritating, useless, a complete and utter waste of time and data, it physically pained me to use this, i hope and pray that no one will ever experience the same agony and despair of opening this app, but knowing the cruel nature of this world i suppose it’s inevitable that that may happen. to the poor soul reading through these and thinking of downloading this cursed application. please don’t. i beg you, for your own sanity...

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app constantly made my phone crash and would drain the battery from my phone. It took up so much memory on my phone even though I never even got to open it once! Do not recommend!!!!

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
attributes.review:
omg u call this app good my grad grandma is a trump supporter so she downloaded this but when she went to the app she had a anxiety attack and she died Bc on the front page the was it trump was just there naked and he was showing everything and I mean EVERYTHING! attributes.title: TIKTOK
attributes.review: this ad is not only disgusting to be seen on the App Store but is generally a bad app I was told I will be updated on stuff he does in the notifications were lost my phone and my phone will vibrate from a reason I give this app a zero out of 10

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what his plans were for the future thinking “maybe he’s not that bad” but he was worse, the app crashed every time I opened it, how can you have all this money and not even have a good app

According to all known laws
of aviation, there is no way a bee
should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Yellow, black. Ooh, black and yellow! Let's shake it up a little.

attributes.title: Really?
attributes.review: This app just kept crashing and crashing I keep having problems with everything on here I can’t believe this hasn’t been fixed.  And don’t delete tik tok trump you’re just going to make more people hate you

attributes.title: NASTY. 🤮
attributes.review: i love i just LOVE our wonderfully orange cheeto king but this app just ain’t it. it CRASHES every other five seconds and whenever it does stay open, my entire phone freezes. i am HIGHLY dissatisfied. i expected so much more from the man  who’s supposed to make america great again. 😔
